channel.title: 508 client error
channel.description: Hi i am very new to making clients i just downloaded padlinos 508 and i run it it says [code] error_game_js5connect[/code]

item.title: 508 client error
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

This is a very easy fix. You will have to download the cache and put it in a file called “cache508” in C:. I have made a tutorial about this a long time ago, check it out.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 client error
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Ok, so the client freezes and gives that error message on Connecting to Update server. Put 2 and 2 together. If theres an error about connecting to a server… don’t you think you should run the server?

You have to have the server running for the client to start up, it says that everywhere. Not sure how you miss these kinds of things.

Read full topic
